CardNames.2:
Material Cartel

Q: How does the supply on this card interact with other cards and abilities?
A: The resources count towards ambitions and Keeper's Solidarity, but they cannot be discarded for Relic Fence or be stolen.

Q: Do rivals discard even if Tycoon wasn't scored?
A: Yes.

Q: Can I discard this even if there is nothing to steal?
A: Yes. Any card that says you can discard it to do something else can simply be discarded.
CardNames.3:
Admin Union

Q: When do you collect the action card?
A: At the end of the round, after all players have finished their turns.

Q: Can this be stolen once it has been played but not resolved?
A: Only cards in the holder's play area can be stolen, so once played this card cannot be stolen.

CardNames.12:
Skirmishers

Q: Can I reroll this multiple times?
A: No, only once.
CardNames.15:
Lattice Spies

Q: Can I discard this even if I cannot seize?
A: Yes. Any card that says you can discard it to do something else can simply be discarded.
CardNames.16:
Farseers

Q: Can you give me an example of this Prelude action if I discarded 2 cards plus Farseers?
A: You would draw 3 cards from the bottom of the action card discard pile.

Q: Can I discard zero cards beyond this one?
A: Yes! In this case, just draw 1 card.

Q: What happens if the discard pile is very small when I use this?
A: Shuffle all of the cards you are discarding before placing them on the discard pile. This is one of the few situations where discard order matters in the game.
CardNames.19:
Silver-Tongues

Q: Can I discard this even if I cannot steal anything?
A: Yes. Any card that says you can discard it to do something else can simply be discarded.
CardNames.22:
Elder Broker

Q: Is Trade blocked by Sworn Guardians?
A: The Trade action is not stealing and is not blocked by Sworn Guardians.
CardNames.24:
Galactic Bards

Q: In what order do you choose to seize the initiative and declare an ambition?
A: Either order.

Q: How does this interact with '7' action cards and Faithful Cards?
A: For '7' action cards, you may declare any ambition. For Faithful cards, you may declare an ambition based on the current Faith, such as Pluralistic Faith.
CardNames.25:
Mass Uprising

Q: If I Ransack the Court to secure this during a battle, do ships I place in the battle system count as attacking ships?
A: No.
